backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for policies, users, products, orders, educational content, and includes comparison modules and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking updated header navigation styling to affected frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides concise per-file summaries for key frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles across the application.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point with metadata, PWA tags, icons, and root mount for the frontend app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and screenshots.
frontend/public/policies/marketplace-pol: Markdown document outlining marketplace rules, responsibilities, fees, and prohibited activities.
Privacy policy detailing data collection, usage, rights, and security measures.
Returns policy describing eligibility, process, refunds, and exclusions.
frontend/public/policies/shipping-policy: Defines shipping methods, costs, processing times, tracking, restrictions, and procedures for lost or damaged packages.
frontend/public/policies/terms-and-condi: Outlines user responsibilities, marketplace rules, payments, liability limits, dispute resolution, and account termination terms.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app’s router, query client, and routes for pages like FAQs, blogs, policies, settings, and admin.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessLink: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/admin/assistant/: Admin interface for viewing, searching, adding, and editing assistant knowledge base entries with dialogs and validation.
Admin panel listing unanswered questions and allowing conversion into knowledge base entries via a dialog workflow.
frontend/src/components/admin/Marketplac: Admin panel that loads, displays, and refreshes marketplace roadmap data with progress metrics and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Admin view showing user role counts with loading and permission error states.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Full-featured assistant chat UI supporting text, speech recognition, text‑to‑speech, mode switching, and auto-scrolling.
Floating AI assistant button that opens a chat panel component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with legal links, contact information, and accepted payment methods.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main layout with header navigation, authentication handling, banner, mobile menu, and footer.
frontend/src/components/policies/PolicyD: Loads and displays a policy file with basic markdown rendering and signature status checks.
frontend/src/components/policies/PolicyS: UI for reviewing, accepting, and digitally signing policies, integrating backend signature submission.
frontend/src/components/policies/Require: Gatekeeper component that blocks access until all required policies are signed.
frontend/src/components/privacy/CookieCo: Shows a dismissible cookie consent banner and stores the user’s choice.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Displays a form for users to submit their name and email to create a profile using a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/RouterErrorScree: Shows an error screen for routing failures with options to refresh or return home.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches runtime and unhandled promise errors and displays a recovery UI with technical details and a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/security/HumanCh: Modal dialog requiring a checkbox and math challenge to verify user is human.
frontend/src/components/startup/LessonDe: Displays lesson details including video, HTML content, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/contexts/VoiceSettingsConte: Context provider for microphone permission state and voice preference settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistant.ts: Mutation hook for asking questions to the backend assistant API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicrophonePermissi: Manages microphone permission state, checks browser support, watches permission changes, and requests access via getUserMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageActivity.ts: Tracks whether the page is active by listening to visibility, focus, and blur events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for roles, admin data, policy identifiers, mutations, and permission handling.
Implements speech-to-text using browser speech recognition, handling permissions, events, transcripts, errors, and optional auto-restart.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Controls browser text-to-speech playback with state tracking, speak/stop/cancel actions, and support checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoicePreferences.t: Loads and updates stored voice-related user preferences such as activation and spoken replies.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color variables, menu styles, animated logo text, and voice UI animations.
frontend/src/lib/cookieConsent.ts: Provides helpers to get/set cookie consent state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/humanCheck.ts: Implements a session-based human verification flag with a 30‑minute TTL and utilities to read, set, or clear it.
frontend/src/lib/policies.ts: Defines policy identifiers and metadata, and exports a metadata map plus an array of all policies.
frontend/src/lib/pricingCopy.ts: Provides centralized pricing model text and standalone site pricing details for display in the UI.
frontend/src/lib/voice/browserVoice.ts: Implements browser feature checks and factories for speech recognition and text‑to‑speech controllers.
Manages voice feature preferences using localStorage with versioning and helper setters.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPortalPage.tsx: Renders the authenticated account portal with navigation to payouts, business settings, and financial services.
frontend/src/pages/AdminCenterPage.tsx: Displays admin‑only financial dashboards with authentication, authorization checks, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlog.tsx: Renders a customer‑facing blog listing with categories, excerpts, and navigation to posts.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlogPost.tsx: Loads a blog post by ID and displays full content with navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFAQ.tsx: Renders a customer FAQ page using accordions with questions, answers, and pricing model references.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFavoritesPage: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
Displays a messages page with login gating and a placeholder inbox indicating messaging is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerProfileHome.t: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPurchaseHisto: Shows purchase history UI with login check and a placeholder indicating order tracking is coming soon.
Provides account settings including voice permissions, mic handling, and policy signatures, gated behind login.
Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/FunnelsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showcasing marketplace features, hero section, and navigation links to key services.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePolicyPage: Renders the marketplace-wide policy document via a PolicyDocument component.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PciCompliancePage.tsx: Displays PCI compliance certificate details with view/download options and security explanations.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy using the PolicyDocument component.
frontend/src/pages/ReturnsPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the returns policy via the PolicyDocument component.
frontend/src/pages/SellerPayoutsPage.tsx: Page for managing seller payouts, bank accounts, and business debit/credit card requests with query hooks and forms.
frontend/src/pages/SellersBusinessesBlog: Renders a blog index of curated posts for sellers and businesses with navigation to individual posts.
Displays a single blog post based on URL params using a local posts map.
FAQ page listing common questions about business and B2B features using accordion components.
frontend/src/pages/ShippingPolicyPage.ts: Loads and displays the shipping policy document via the shared PolicyDocument component.
frontend/src/pages/StartupDashboard.tsx: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/StoreBuilderPage.tsx: Placeholder file for the store builder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Placeholder file for the main store page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Displays the terms and conditions document via the PolicyDocument component.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines shared frontend TypeScript types for users, products, orders, programs, integrations, and store builder data.
frontend/src/types/speech.d.ts: Provides TypeScript definitions for the Web Speech API including SpeechRecognition and related events.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing and new feature requests, and versioned state for menu background and readability improvements.
